decoworld.server

Class ManagementHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • decoworld.server.ManagementHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class ManagementHandler
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    A class accessible by all so that common game management tasks can be easily accessed and completed.

      • kickUser

        public static void kickUser(decoworld.protocol.management.KickUser kickUser)
                     throws DatabaseException
        Kick user off server recording the action as a kick user entity and tell client to exit. There are also penalties associated with being kicked a certain number of times in a given time frame.
        Parameters:
        kickUser -
        Throws:
